title: Bared and Spread-eagled 3: Confessions of a Choir Girl
description: ALL CHARACTERS DEPICTED HERE ARE WELL ABOVE THE AGE OF CONSENT.There's something wrong with my memory, and the way I subconsciously choose to obscure parts of it. But I keep coming back to what I would refer to as the INCIDENT. At least, flashes of it.Now, I am about to get married. I need to get this out of my system.Bared and Spread-eagled LLC is going to help me. Under hypnosis, they will extract what happened to me with Father Matthew all those years ago, and they will re-enact everything right here, right now in the present.Father Matthew. Even the mere mention of his name conjures chills and excitement in my bones. He is handsome. Imposing. Ambiguous. And very, very strict.How exactly will my re-enactment play out?
author: Aphrodite Hunt
